body: I know Japanese so here is highlight of this story--- Technically it IS rape, but NOT like some mindbreak. She was just dumped by her BF (w/o doing something erotic) bcoz she is a tomboy (fuckin' idiot), and then her 2 disciplines saw it and to take revenge (for throwing them all time during practice), they force on her. At the end, she punishes them by again throwing them after that act, but was NOT pissed or annoyed, bcoz they end up cheering her up and she asked if they ALL 3 WILL do it again. so, yeah TOMBOY SUPREMACY!!
Looks good, hope it gets translated one day.
